From: "dcoburn" <dcoburn@...>

::Hakibuscon::

	Hakibuscon stood still for a moment.  He listened to Dinobot's words
carefully.  Very carefully.  This bot was born as a Predacon, but turned
over to the Maximals.  Hakibuscon knew that Dinobot had been thinking about
something.  Something called the past.  Hakibuscon thought about his own
past.  He wasn't born as a Maximal.  He wasn't born as a Predacon.  And he
wasn't born as whatever you call bots of the Alliance.  He was just..born. 
Hakibuscon wasn't too peaceful like the Maximals, yet he wasn't a killer
like the Predacons.  What was he?  He was just...himself.  No leaders.  No
orders.  No factions.................No purpose.  Hakibuscon was nothing. 
Just a interference in the raging war.

	"I will leave you alone, and when I leave don't even let me cross your
mind for a second.  Don't tell anyone about me.  Pretend you never met me
ok?!!" Hakibuscon said in a calm but sort of glum voice.  Hakibuscon walked
away, but stopped for a second.  Hakibuscon turned around and walked
straight back, but had no intentions of hurting anyone.  He walked past
Dinobot to the place where Dinobot had been drinking.  He grabbed his
missile gun and threw it into the water.  Then he pulled out his ray gun,
snapped it across his knee and threw it into the water as well.  Hakibuscon
stood still for a second and then grabbed out his best weapon which he had
had for many solar-cycles.  It was a laser sword.  He looked at it dearly
for a moment, and decided that it too, had to go.  He threw it as hard as
he could and then started walking away.  

	"Goodbye.  I serve no purpose to this war.  I simply don't belong.  Nobody
or nothing needs me.  Like I said, never remember me!" Hakibuscon said
sadly.  He screamed in anger and sadness then went vehicle mode and sped
away.
